definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

pinyin: ji2 xing4 qing2 hua4 wu4 zhong1 du2

sentences.english: That might be how you're more familiar with cyanide.
sentences.chinese: 大家可能對氰化物的這一面更加熟悉。

sentences.english: Electrodepositing technology of Ag-Cd alloy from cyanide bath was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氰化物體系電沉積銀鎘合金的工藝。

sentences.english: And extracting it from this rock often means leaching it out with cyanide.
sentences.chinese: 從岩石中提取意味着還會殘留下有害的氰化物。

sentences.english: Cyanide is highly toxic to living organism.
sentences.chinese: 氰化物對生物有機體有劇毒。

sentences.english: Tiny quantities of either ricin or cyanide are fatal.
sentences.chinese: 蓖麻毒素或者氰化物只需少量即可致命。

sentences.english: A single gram of ricin, the bean's main toxin, is thousands of times more powerful than cyanide.
sentences.chinese: 一克蓖麻毒素毒效等於氰化物的上千倍。

sentences.english: In various industrial wastewaters there often a little cyanide.
sentences.chinese: 在各種不同的工業廢水中，常含有少量的氰化物。

sentences.english: Heavy metals, cyanide, and toxic organics.
sentences.chinese: 重金屬，氰化物和有毒有機物。

sentences.english: that are going to have that high cyanide content, so we should all be relieved.
sentences.chinese: 氰化物的木薯製品，因此我們都可以放心了。

sentences.english: This is a very rare case of acute and lethal cyanide intoxication.
sentences.chinese: 這是一極爲罕見致死性氰化物中毒的急症。

sentences.english: Cyanide comes from nature, after all, as do many toxic substances.
sentences.chinese: 氰化物來自天然，但實際上它是一種有毒物質。

sentences.english: Hydroxocobalamin is an effective cyanide antidote when administered intravenously.
sentences.chinese: 靜脈注射羥鈷胺是一種有效的氰化物解毒方式。

sentences.english: If all the cyanides are oriented the same way, as in Fig.
sentences.chinese: 如果全部都是氰化物面向一樣，在圖。

sentences.english: The wastewater in removing bitterness from almonds is a kind of organic wastewater consisted of cyanide.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁脫苦廢水是一種含氰化物的有機廢水。

sentences.english: The bitter, of course, are the ones that are very high in cyanide.
sentences.chinese: 苦的根，當然，是富含氰化物的那種。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a gas chromatography method for determination of cyanide in air.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立一種氣相色譜測定空氣中氰化物的方法。

definition: a poison/a toxic agent/poison gas/a chemical weapon
